text: "Texas Hold 'Em" is a song recorded by American singer Beyoncé. It was revealed in a Verizon Wireless commercial during Super Bowl LVIII on February 11, 2024, with the song being released after the commercial alongside another Beyoncé track, "16 Carriages". They were announced alongside Beyoncé's eighth studio album, Act II, later revealed as Cowboy Carter (2024). The song was written by Beyoncé with Killah B, Nathan Ferraro, Raphael Saadiq, bülow, and Lowell, with production done by the first three. The song entered the US Billboard Hot 100 at number two but topped the chart the following week, becoming Beyoncé's ninth solo US chart-topper (and 13th when counted as a member of Destiny's Child). She also became the first Black woman to top Billboard's Hot Country Songs chart. It also reached number one in the UK, Canada, New Zealand, and Ireland. == References == Category:Country pop songs Category:R&B; songs Category:2024 songs Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Texas Hold 'Em (song)
